resources.string: Manually start your radio app. Click on the top *Start*. From now on, when the news ends - the audio will be muted.
Now - for the next 30 seconds - set the volume at which you want to hear the news. The radio will then mute and wake up automatically at the appropriate times.
Now - for the next %1$d seconds - set the volume %2$d (out of 100) at which you want to hear the news. The radio will then mute and wake up automatically at the appropriate times.
Is the radio app playing? Maybe the volume is at zero?!
The app does not turn on the radio itself, you must first turn on the appropriate app.
My quiet wave - set the volume
%1$d seconds left to set the volume. Current value is %2$d (out of 100)
Low volume %2$d (out of 100) audio for the upcoming %1$d minutes
Silent, till the next news at %1$s
The radio app is not playing anymore, you should replay it
